titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the fvnerall of that reverend divine Mr. Robert Collard, batchlour in divinity and pastor of Chilton-Folliat in the county of Wilts fifty yeares, on the 9 of November 1648 by Iohn Millet ...
titleStmt.author: Millet, John.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A funerall sermon for Mr. Robert Collard.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
